query: SELECT e.id, e.turmaId, t.codigo, e.tipoEvento FROM eventos e INNER JOIN turmas t ON e.turmaId = t.id WHERE t.codigo IN ('654', '974', '799') ORDER BY t.codigo, e.tipoEvento;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3WG3DCJNDgKq1ck.d12df11ceaba --database axWmxYbCBHHB5ETKSgA95A --execute SELECT e.id, e.turmaId, t.codigo, e.tipoEvento FROM eventos e INNER JOIN turmas t ON e.turmaId = t.id WHERE t.codigo IN ('654', '974', '799') ORDER BY t.codigo, e.tipoEvento;
